languages.text: "Не стоит жалеть о проклятом, Ваша Светлость. Я... сам выбрал эту участь, потому что оказался слаб".
"Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."
languages.original_text: "Не стоит жалеть о проклятом, Ваша Светлость. Я... сам выбрал эту участь, потому что оказался слаб".

traits.locale_text: "Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate, because I turned out to be weak."
"Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate, because I turned out to be weak."
"Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, uh, chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."

"Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."

languages.text: 「後悔など、呪われた者には無駄なことです、陛下。今のこの運命は、俺が弱かったせいだ」
languages.original_text: "Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."

traits.locale_text: 「後悔など、呪われた者には無駄なことです、陛下。今のこの運命は、俺が、その、弱かったせいだ」

languages.text: “请不要在我这个被诅咒之人的身上浪费您的感情，大人。我……是我自己选择了这样的命运，因为我太懦弱了。”
languages.original_text: "Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."

traits.locale_text: “请不要在我这个被诅咒之人的身上浪费您的感情，大人。我，呃，我自己选择了这样的命运，因为我太懦弱了。”

languages.text: «No malgaste sus lamentos con un condenado, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Yo... elegí este destino porque era débil».
languages.original_text: "Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."

traits.locale_text: «No malgaste sus lamentos con un condenado, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Elegí este destino porque era débil».

languages.text: "Den Verdammten hilft Bedauern wenig, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich ... habe mein Schicksal gewählt, weil ich mich als schwach entpuppt habe."
languages.original_text: "Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."

traits.locale_text: "Den Verdammten hilft Bedauern wenig, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich, äh, habe mein Schicksal gewählt, weil ich mich als schwach entpuppt habe."

languages.text: « Les damnés n'ont que faire des regrets des autres, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai... mérité ce qui m'est arrivé, car j'étais faible. »
languages.original_text: "Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."

traits.locale_text: « Les damnés n'ont que faire des regrets des autres, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai... mérité ce qui m'est arrivé, parce que j'étais faible. »

languages.text: "Dileklerinizi lanetlilerle boşa harcarsınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ben... Güçsüz olduğumu anladığım için bu kaderi seçtim."
languages.original_text: "Regret is wasted on the damned, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I... chose my fate because I turned out to be weak."

traits.locale_text: "Dileklerinizi lanetlilerle boşa harcarsınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ben... Güçsüz olduğumu anladığım için bu kaderi seçtim."
